articles.author: Antoinette Tyrrell
articles.title: Urgent Response Needed to Measles Outbreak in Europe - European Views
articles.description: The WHO European Region is calling for an urgent response to the measles outbreak surging across the region.
articles.content: Updated data from 2023 released by the WHO has highlighted the urgency of a swift and concerted response to measles outbreaks in the WHO European Region. Last year, more than 58,000 people in 41 of t… [+2500 chars]

articles.title: Pioneering European ERS-2 satellite burns up over Pacific - BBC.com
articles.description: The veteran ERS-2 Earth observation spacecraft dives to destruction 2,000km west of California.
articles.content:
Artwork: Europe's Earth Remote Sensing satellites weighed about 2.5 tonnes at launch
A European satellite that pioneered many of the technologies used to monitor the planet and its climate has falle… [+4049 chars]
